Class Shape

    • client.Shape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    An object class to represent a shape drawn onto the panel

    tdowd

        public Shape(java.lang.String t,
     boolean f,
     int a,
     int b,
     int c,
     int d,
     java.awt.Color col)
        Constructor for the Shape object
        Parameters:
        t - the type of the shape
        f - the fill of the shape
        a - the x coordinate of the first click
        b - the y coordinate of the first click
        c - the x coordinate of the second click
        d - the y coordinate of the second click
        col - the color of the shape
